body_html:
You can see this in the 3.6 and 3.5 builds. The 2.7.9 and 2.7 builds have a lesser version of the same issue:

05:06:01 test_anomaly_detect_nan (main.TestAutograd) ... No forward pass information available.
05:06:01 Enable detect anomaly during forward pass for more informations.
05:06:01 No forward pass information available.
05:06:01 Enable detect anomaly during forward pass for more informations.
05:06:01 ok

You can see this in the 3.6 and 3.5 builds. The 2.7.9 and 2.7 builds have a lesser version of the same issue:
